entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Rain showers beginning near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 3 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers changing to rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
